Use: HAFNIUM has granted privileges to domain accounts. [2]

Use: HAFNIUM has used cmd.exe to execute commands on the victim's machine. [4]

Use: HAFNIUM has exfiltrated data to file sharing sites, including MEGA. [1]

HAFNIUM has exploited CVE-2021-44228 in Log4j and CVE-2021-26855, CVE-2021-26857, CVE-2021-26858, and CVE-2021-27065  to compromise on-premises versions of Microsoft Exchange Server. [1] [2] [5] [6] [7]

Technique: Gather Victim Host Information: Client Configurations
Use: HAFNIUM has interacted with Office 365 tenants to gather details regarding target's environments. [1]

Use: HAFNIUM has collected e-mail addresses for users they intended to target. [2]

Use: HAFNIUM has hidden files on a compromised host. [4]
